# Callwell

> Callwell is an AI office assistant that acts as a virtual front desk for service businesses — answering calls, booking appointments, and managing scheduling 24/7 when your team is unavailable.

Callwell replaces traditional answering services with AI-powered call handling. It speaks naturally with customers, understands their needs, books appointments directly into your schedule, and routes emergency calls to your on-call team. No hardware required — it works with your existing phone number.

## Products

- [Call Answering](https://callwell.io/automated-call-answering): 24/7 AI-powered call answering for service businesses. Handles every customer interaction automatically.
- [Appointment Scheduling](https://callwell.io/ai-appointment-scheduling): Automated booking system that handles scheduling, cancellations, and waitlists without human intervention.
- [Emergency Call Routing](https://callwell.io/emergency-call-routing): Intelligent escalation system that detects urgent calls and routes them to your on-call team with human-in-the-loop verification.

## Industries

- [Plumbing & HVAC](https://callwell.io/industries/plumbing-hvac): AI answering for plumbers and heating & cooling companies. Handles emergency dispatch, service call booking, and after-hours coverage.
- [Electrician](https://callwell.io/industries/electrician): AI answering for electrical contractors. Books service appointments and dispatches electricians 24/7.
- [Construction & Contracting](https://callwell.io/industries/construction): AI answering for general contractors. Handles project inquiries, books consultations, and captures leads.
- [Window & Door Installation](https://callwell.io/industries/window-door): AI answering for window and door companies. Books installations and captures leads.
- [Dental Clinics](https://callwell.io/industries/dental-clinics): AI answering for dental practices. Books appointments, handles cancellations, and keeps chairs full.
- [Medical Clinics](https://callwell.io/industries/medical-clinics): AI answering for medical practices. Books appointments and keeps your front desk running smoothly.
- [Physiotherapy & Massage](https://callwell.io/industries/physiotherapy-massage): AI answering for PT and massage clinics. Books appointments and keeps your schedule full.

## Blog

- [How Many Calls Is Your Business Missing After Hours?](https://callwell.io/blog/missed-calls-cost): Learn how missed calls cost service businesses thousands in lost revenue.
- [AI Receptionist vs Answering Service](https://callwell.io/blog/ai-receptionist-vs-answering-service): Compare AI receptionists to traditional answering services.
